comments:
20030917

Started with a new workspace an created a CVS connection for dev.eclipse.org
By mistake, I choose ext instead of extssh. The wixard accepted my settings
without complaining, but when expanding the HEAD node a NP was filled in the
.log file.

Wouldn't it be possible to add checking, and if not; printing a NPE to the log
seems wrong.
